reviewTitle: We had such an enjoyable stay
reviewMessage1: The pictures donâ€™t do it justice! The surroundings and interior are really lovely - we especially liked the bathroom.
reviewMessage2: The weather was hot on some nights so the air conditioning was very welcome. Arko communicated with us extremely well and we would be very happy to stay here again!

reviewMessage1: If you're not careful, you might struggle to make the already generous checkout time.
reviewMessage2: The sauna, although modest in size, rapidly gets up to a scorching temperature which makes for a perfect opportunity to cool yourself down in the pond - even better if it's frozen over with a hole cut through the ice!

reviewMessage1: Very beautiful and big shower. A couple of steps from the studio is a sauna. I loved it that there was a big bed, and needless to say the chill area with a couch and TV.
reviewMessage2: Large windows, with private views of the outdoors. Nice to meet you, we felt so welcomed!

reviewMessage1: Totally recommend! Location is super, just a few minutes from center and the place itself was very beautiful with big garden! The hosts were such a nice people!
reviewMessage2: They really were spreading positive energy to us and we just loved them and the place :)! Thank you so much!
